00052 namespace phys
00053 {
00054     ActorTerrain::ActorTerrain(Vector3 InitPosition, String name, String file, String group) : ActorBase(name, file, group)
00055     {
00056         CreateMotionState(this->node, InitPosition);
00057         CreateCollisionTerrain();
00058     }
00059 
00060     ActorTerrain::~ActorTerrain()
00061     {
00062     }
00063 
00064     void ActorTerrain::CreateCollisionTerrain()
00065     {
00066         //CollisionObject = new btCollisionObject();
00067         btScalar mass = 0.f;
00068         RigidBody = new btRigidBody(mass, this->MotionState, this->Shape);
00069         CollisionObject = RigidBody;
00070         CollisionObject->setUserPointer(this);
00071         ActorType = ActorBase::Actorterrain;
00072     }
00073 
00074     void ActorTerrain::CreateShapeFromMeshStatic()
00075     {
00076         if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00077         {
00078             delete Shape;
00079         }
00080         /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00081         btBvhTriangleMeshShape *tmpshape = new btBvhTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh(),true);
00082         this->Shape=tmpshape;
00083         ShapeIsSaved = false;
00084         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(1.0,1.0,1.0));
00085         this->CollisionObject->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00086         this->RigidBody->updateInertiaTensor();
00087     }
00088 
00089     void ActorTerrain::CreateShapeFromMeshDynamic(short unsigned int accuracy)
00090     {
00091     }
00092 
00093     std::string ActorTerrain::GetName () const
00094     {
00095         return this->entity->getName();
00096     }
00097 
00098     void ActorTerrain::AddObjectToWorld (World *TargetWorld)
00099     {
00100         TargetWorld->GetPhysicsManager()->GetPhysicsWorldPointer()->addCollisionObject(this->CollisionObject);
00101         //TargetWorld->Physics->BulletDynamicsWorld->addRigidBody(this->CollisionObject);
00102         this->AttachToGraphics();
00103     }
00104 
00105     void ActorTerrain::RemoveObjectFromWorld(World* TargetWorld)
00106     {
00107         TargetWorld->GetPhysicsManager()->GetPhysicsWorldPointer()->removeCollisionObject(this->CollisionObject);
00108         //TargetWorld->Physics->BulletDynamicsWorld->removeRigidBody(this->CollisionObject);
00109         this->DetachFromGraphics();
00110     }
00111 }
